author: Cortex XSOAR

commands.description: Run this command to complete the authorization process. Should be used after running the msgraph-auth-start command.
commands.name: msgraph-api-auth-complete

commands.description: Run a Microsoft Graph API query.
commands.name: msgraph-api-request

commands.description: Run this command if for some reason you need to rerun the authentication process.
commands.name: msgraph-api-auth-reset

commands.description: Tests connectivity to Microsoft when using Cortex XSOAR Azure app.
commands.name: msgraph-api-test

commands.description: Run this command to start the authorization process and follow the instructions in the command results.
commands.name: msgraph-api-auth-start

integration.description: Use the Microsoft Graph API integration to interact with Microsoft APIs that do not have dedicated integrations in Cortex XSOAR, for example, Mail Single-User, etc.
integration.name: Microsoft Graph API

description: Use the Microsoft Graph API integration to interact with Microsoft APIs that do not have dedicated integrations in Cortex XSOAR, for example, Mail Single-User, etc.
name: Microsoft Graph API
